a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Life expectancy vs. liberal democracy index, 2023
Liberal democracy based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem, ranging from 0 to 1 (most democratic).
Data source: UN WPP (2024); HMD (2024); Zijdeman et al. (2015); Riley (2005); V-Dem (2024)
Note: Shown is the period life expectancy. This is the average number of years a newborn would live if age-specific mortality rates in
the current year were to stay the same throughout its life.
